prompt: My fingers feel clubbed ->
completion: This may be a sign of lung disease or a range of genetic disease. Please get an apointment with a Pulmonologist.

prompt: My mother is experiencing shortness of breath ->
completion: This may be a sign of heart disease. Please get an apointment with a Cardiologist.

prompt: What does having severe headache and blurred vision mean ->
completion: This may be a sign of migraine or high blood pressure. Please get an appointment with a Neurologist or a General Practitioner.

prompt: The cough is persistent and also chest pain ->
completion: This may be a sign of pneumonia or bronchitis. Please get an appointment with a Pulmonologist.

prompt: My relative has abdominal pain and nausea ->
completion: This may be a sign of gastritis or a gastrointestinal infection. Please get an appointment with a Gastroenterologist.

prompt: I always experirence sudden weight loss and fatigue. What is wrong with my health ->
completion: This may be a sign of an underlying medical condition. Please get an appointment with a General Practitioner for a comprehensive evaluation.

prompt: I have been going for frequent urination and also have increased thirst ->
completion: This may be a sign of diabetes. Please get an appointment with an Endocrinologist.

prompt: My father has joint pain and swelling. What should we do ->
completion: This may be a sign of arthritis or an autoimmune disorder. Please get an appointment with a Rheumatologist.

prompt: I have skin rash and itching. Is it an allergy ->
completion: This may be a sign of an allergic reaction or a skin infection. Please get an appointment with a Dermatologist.

prompt: My daughter has frequent mood swings and difficulty concentrating. How can we help her ->
completion: This may be a sign of anxiety or depression. Please get an appointment with a Psychiatrist or a Mental Health Specialist.

prompt: I have difficulty swallowing and hoarseness in my throat ->
completion: This may be a sign of a throat or esophageal disorder. Please get an appointment with an Otolaryngologist.

prompt: I have a fever, sore throat, and cough. How should I treat it ->
completion: This may be a sign of a viral respiratory infection, such as the common cold or flu. Please get an appointment with a General Practitioner.

prompt: My friend has fatigue, pale skin, and shortness of breath. What does she have ->
completion: This may be a sign of anemia or another blood-related condition. Please get an appointment with a Hematologist.

prompt: My sister is always suffering with back pain and radiating leg pain. I don't know what to do ->
completion: This may be a sign of a herniated disc or sciatica. Please get an appointment with an Orthopedic Surgeon or a Neurologist.

prompt: My brother has frequent headaches and sensitivity to light. Is something wrong with his eyes ->
completion: This may be a sign of migraines. Please get an appointment with a Neurologist or a Headache Specialist.

prompt: My uncle has difficulty breathing and wheezing. Should we consult a doctor ->
completion: This may be a sign of asthma or chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (COPD). Please get an appointment with a Pulmonologist.

prompt: Is abdominal bloating and changes in bowel habits serious problem ->
completion: This may be a sign of irritable bowel syndrome (IBS) or another gastrointestinal disorder. Please get an appointment with a Gastroenterologist.

prompt: Are having swollen and painful joints with morning stiffness serious health issues ->
completion: This may be a sign of rheumatoid arthritis. Please get an appointment with a Rheumatologist.

prompt: My friend has been experiencing sudden vision loss or blurred vision nowadays ->
completion: This may be a sign of an eye-related emergency. Please get an appointment with an Ophthalmologist or seek immediate medical attention.

prompt: I am feeling chest pain and shortness of breath ->
completion: This may be a sign of a heart attack or other cardiovascular condition. Please seek immediate medical attention or call emergency services.
